mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_Vault (v_number, type, alias, comment, card_bank, card_owner, payment_count, income_count, create_time, last_modify_time, last_modify_person, enable) VALUES (#{v_number}, #{type}, #{alias}, #{comment}, #{card_bank}, #{card_owner}, #{payment_count}, #{income_count}, #{create_time}, #{last_modify_time}, #{last_modify_person}, #{enable} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM b_Vault
v_number LIKE '%${v_number}%'
AND type = #{type}
AND alias LIKE '%${alias}%'
AND card_bank LIKE '%${card_bank}%'
AND card_owner LIKE '%{card_owner}%'
SELECT * FROM b_Vault WHERE b_Vault.v_number NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT v_number FROM a_DepartmentVault WHERE state = false) AND enable = true ORDER BY create_time desc, alias
SELECT * FROM b_Vault WHERE b_Vault.v_number IN (SELECT DISTINCT v_number FROM a_DepartmentVault WHERE dep_id = #{dep_id} AND state = false) AND enable = true ORDER BY create_time desc, alias
mapper.update: UPDATE b_Vault SET payment_count = payment_count + 1 WHERE v_number = #{v_number}
UPDATE b_Vault SET income_count = income_count + 1 WHERE v_number = #{v_number}
